car.tp1.ftp

Class FtpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • car.tp1.ftp.FtpRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class FtpRequest
extends Thread
    Class FtpRequest Process an FTP Session This class receives messages received by the server and will process them. (Calls to the class CmdControleur)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Brahim DJARALLAH et Romain LAMOOT
